description: I’ve read a lot of fantasy books and watched my fair share of fantasy settings on-screen, but few have captured my attention in quite the way the world of Conquest has. title: Why I Love the World of Conquest

description: If you’ve missed it, we reviewed all of the factions, the manifestations, and regiments and armies of renown. That’s been a lot of content and plenty to read through! title: List Writing in Age of Sigmar 4th Edition

description: In this series of articles we take a deep dive into a specific detachment for a faction, covering the faction’s rules and upgrades and talking about how to build around that faction for competitive play. In this article, we’re covering the Hypercrypt Legion Detachment for the Necrons. The Tenth Edition release of Codex: Necrons gives […]
title: Detachment Focus: Hypercrypt Legion

description: John from Can You Roll a Crit? covers Custodes for Kill Team, discussing how this Compendium faction is still so good despite the original nerfs they received over 2 years ago! Watch on to see why Talons of the Emperor are still a force to be reckoned with! Have any questions or feedback? Drop us […]
title: CYRAC: Why Custodes Are Still So Strong in Kill Team
